Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its unique benefits, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. This special price is an opportunity for you to experience the best without exceeding your budget. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
